getPatients

public java.util.List<PatientBO> getPatients()
Returns a list of all loaded patients. This collection is cached and filtered by the currently set getPatientFilter()

Returns:
list of all loaded patients.
See Also:
refreshPatients()

refreshPatients

public void refreshPatients()
Refreshes the list of loaded patients. This method will use the specified filter to only load specific patients.

setPatientFilter

public void setPatientFilter(java.lang.String searchString)
Sets the filter string to only load specific patients during load. This query supports several properties to mention like the InsuranceNumber and the name of a Patient. This method will not trigger any patient reloading.

Parameters:
searchString - the filter string.

getPatientFilter

public java.lang.String getPatientFilter()
Gets the currently loaded filter for loading patients.

Returns:
the currently set filter.
